    Handwoven Cotton Jacket, Ankara

    Handwoven Cotton Jacket, Ankara

    Only 24 left in stock

    Log in to save your wishlist.

    Please login
    SHARE Share on Facebook Pin on Pinterest

    Full Description

    Our unisex Handwoven Cotton Jacket in natural and charcoal stripe is an easy to wear relaxed shape, this jacket wraps at the front to tie with a cotton belt in the same fabric and features two lined side pockets.

    Handwoven on traditional wooden looms in Turkey, where weaving is an ancestral craft passed down through the generations, our natural cotton jackets can be matched with a hammam towel in the same fabric to make a great travel set.

    • 100% Cotton
    • Handwoven and made in Turkey
    • One size
    • Unisex
    • Bust/width approx 66cm
    • Length approx 79cm
    • Sleeve length approx 55cm
    • Tie length approx 186cm

    Shipping and Returns

    DELIVERY

    We are still working with a reduced team and following government advice on keeping our warehouse and staff safe during the pandemic.

    UK Mainland - a carriage charge of £10 applies to orders under £500 (ex VAT), carriage is free on orders above £500 (ex VAT).

    UK Highlands & Islands, Northern Ireland - carriage charge is a flat rate of £16.

    International - delivery terms are ex works and we will quote the most competitive price from our couriers based on order size.

    RETURNS

    Notification of faulty goods must be made in writing within 5 days of delivery. Goods may only be returned by formal agreement between the seller and the purchaser and on receipt of a returns number from the seller. 

    Please see our full Terms and Conditions for details.
